title: Login stuck on authenticating
body:
My login screen (Which I dont remember being the current one) is the one with Ezreal holding his hand up to the orb.

It just sits at authenticating endlessly. 

Yes I used hextech repair tool. Yes I allowed and checked the firewall. Yes I force repatched. No telling off my ISP will not change anything.

replies.body:
That sounds like the default login screen from the runes reforged launch, which is actually the same login page I'm getting today as well. All is normal on that note.

Getting stuck on authenticating can be a pretty good sign that your network hasn't been able to get a signal with our servers for some reason. Do me a favor and double check your port forwarding settings for your network. If those ports aren't' set up correctly it could block access entirely. Try [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq8), but also check out the others if that one doesn't help immediately.
They are set up just fine. Everything running smoothly until it just...happens.
